item.title: Rock-Paper-Scissors API Documentation
item.description: Introduction # Welcome to the documentation for the Rock-Paper-Scissors game API. This API allows you to play against the computer and track the score. How to Play # Use the /play endpoint to play a round. Check the /score endpoint to see the current score. If you wish to restart the game, send a request to the /restart endpoint. Enjoy the game! Endpoints # POST /play # Play a round of Rock-Paper-Scissors.
